meanings.definition: Rough or boisterous play or pranks.
meanings.sent1: The children were engaging in horseplay in the playground.
meanings.sent2: The siblings were scolded for their horseplay in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The horseplay between the puppies was so energetic, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The horseplay at the birthday party got a bit out of hand.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had to intervene to stop the horseplay during recess.

meanings.sent1: The horseplay at the family reunion was all in good fun.
meanings.sent2: The students were warned against engaging in horseplay in the school hallways.
meanings.sent3: The horseplay at the picnic added a lively atmosphere to the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The siblings' horseplay often led to laughter and smiles.
meanings.sent5: The horseplay during the game made it even more enjoyable for everyone.
